sentences.en: Contacts conducted at arm's length for five years should suddenly turn into such an ostentatious embrace.
sentences.cn: 五年来保持的不过分亲密的接触现在突然变成如此公开炫耀的拥抱.
他花钱大手大脚且喜欢摆阔.

sentences.en: His conduct would be prudent and cautious; neither extreme nor ostentatious.
sentences.cn: 他的举止总是小心、谨慎, 既不偏激,也不拘谨.

sentences.en: I saw the house is ostentatious when I was outside just now.
sentences.cn: 我刚在外面的时候看见房子在装修.

sentences.en: In the less ostentatious house, No. 2 was a mystery.
sentences.cn: 可是那家较差的客栈, 二号却是个谜.

sentences.en: It is not, however, the most ostentatious house on the reservation.
sentences.cn: 尽管如此, 这并非是当地最豪华的公寓.

sentences.en: It was thought ostentatious of him.
sentences.cn: (大家)认为他那么做是为了炫耀阔绰.

sentences.en: Justice always pales in comparison to vanity and ostentatious displays of power.
sentences.cn: 正义跟虚荣、虚有其表的力量相比,本来就是逊色而苍白的.

sentences.en: Obviously he had plenty of money and was generous in its use without being ostentatious.
sentences.cn: 他显然很有钱，但出手大方却不炫富。

sentences.en: Owning a sewing machine was a ostentatious display.
sentences.cn: 那时候拥有缝纫机简直是可以炫耀的资本.

sentences.en: She carried her car keys on an ostentatious gold key ring.
sentences.cn: 她把汽车钥匙挂在一个夸张的金钥匙圈上。

sentences.en: She's got a lovely way with language without ever sounding ostentatious.
sentences.cn: 她的语言优美，丝毫无装腔作势之感。

sentences.en: Some of the Violets themselves felt that the ugliness of the little Dwarf was almost ostentatious.
sentences.cn: 其实有一些紫罗兰也觉得小矮人的丑陋大半是他自己故意做出来的.

sentences.en: They are too fond of show , ie too ostentatious.
They were neither aggressive nor ostentatious.
sentences.cn: 他们不好斗,也不爱炫耀自己.

trans.tran_cn: 好夸耀的，炫耀的，（态度）自负的，讲排场的，铺张的，外观美丽的，浮华的
trans.tran_en: someone who is ostentatious likes to show everyone how rich they are
